problem_text:
Can the braid group B_n, n ⩾ 4, act faithfully on a regular rooted tree by finite-state automorphisms? Such action is known for B_3. See the definitions in (R. I. Grigorchuk, V. V. Nekrashevich, V. I. Sushchanski˘ı, Proc. Steklov Inst. Math., 2000, no. 4 (231), 128–203).
V. I. Sushchanski˘ı
